schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts lightning fast and prevents worse
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening, a traffic accident occurred on the country road between Machtolsheim and Merklingen, in which a motorcyclist was only slightly injured thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: A 44-year-old driver wanted to turn around 21.30 clock with her VW coming from Merklingen to the left on the state road 1230 in the direction of Machtolsheim.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: In doing so, she overlooked the 24-year-old motorcyclist coming from the direction of Nellingen, who had the right of way.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: In the event of a collision, hand and foot brake levers fly away
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker still tried to avoid the car, but still grazed it on the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: Due to the grazing process, the hand and foot brake levers on the Suzuki were torn off and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: Mentally, he steered his motorcycle in the green stiff next to the road and let it roll out there without falling.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: Due to the collision with the car, the biker still suffered an injury to the Beim and had to be treated in a clinic.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Corona mass infection: 174 harvesters infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: After a corona mass infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people are under quarantine and are no longer allowed to leave the farm.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service monitors the ban on going out.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 harvest helpers were tested positive for the corona pathogen Sars-CoV-2 during the screening, as the district office Dingolfing-Landau announced on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: "In order to avoid further spread, we unfortunately have to take this step to protect the population," said District Administrator Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Previously, seven employees had already been infected in the company - this was the reason for the series test.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The farm is a large vegetable farm that grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beetroot - but the cucumbers only for pickling jars.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural community with a good 3300 inhabitants not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to the citizens to keep calm: "According to our information, it is a closed circle of people".
np-coburg.de.105627.10: On the farm, infected from infected employees were separated, the site is now surrounded by a barrier fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: The Greens and SPD gave the state government joint responsibility.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposition factions accused Prime Minister Markus Söder (CSU) and his cabinet of neglecting the control of the accommodation of seasonal workers.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: "This can take bitter revenge if such local infections take hold and regional lockdowns have to be ordered," said Jürgen Mistol, the parliamentary managing director of the Greens.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD takes a very similar view: "After the corona outbreak in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse in mid-May, we have already called for a special control program for farms with harvest helpers," said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: "From our point of view, hygiene conditions at the workplace and living conditions in particular must be strictly controlled.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: U-Bahn station Aidenbachstraße: Dangerous dispute: 19-Year-old falls after pusher in the track bed
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: In a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station, a 19-year-old fell through a shove and slipped into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling - On Friday, there was a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station at around 4.15 p.m.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passer-by alerted the police, who arrived with several stripes.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: According to initial investigations, a Munich (17) pushed a 19-year-old to the ground.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man slipped over the edge of the platform and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: People from the group of the 17-year-old helped to climb the fallen from the track.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger from an incoming railway.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: As the police announced, it came afterwards again to clashes between the two people.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year-old initially fled the scene, but his personal details could be determined afterwards.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: Accompanied by his father, he went to Police Inspectorate 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year-old is being investigated for bodily injury.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer urges longer data retention
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: According to a media report, however, Federal Interior Minister Horst Seehofer is calling for an extension of the storage period.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: He wants to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, Federal Interior Minister Horst Seehofer (CSU) is calling for extended data retention - half a year instead of the planned ten weeks.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As the "Bild am Sonntag" reports, Seehofer asked Justice Minister Christine Lambrecht (SPD) in a letter for a quick change in the law.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: Seehofer wants to strengthen the measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He considers it useful to "make urgently needed adjustments to the law now," the newspaper quotes from the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: A decision by the ECJ is expected.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: Seehofer, however, wants the changes beforehand, so that they could be applied immediately after a possible positive verdict, the report continues.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A spokesman for the Ministry of Justice told the newspaper that it could only be meaningfully examined whether there would be a need for legal adjustments once the courts had decided.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer, together with the interior ministers of the federal states, had already spoken out in June in favour of data retention.
bild.255016.1: NBA: Strip club trouble for Clippers star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), professional basketball player of the Los Angeles Clippers, is said to have left the tournament quarters at Disney World in Orlando/Florida with permission for a funeral.
bild.255016.4: According to US media reports, he visited the strip club "Magic City" in Atlanta in the evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who is said to have admitted the visit, according to ESPN, is back in Isolation, is tested daily for Covid-19.
bild.255016.6: His reason for the visit: Chicken Wings.
bild.255016.7: In February of last year, "Sweet Lou", as he is called in the NBA, has already expressed his love for exactly these Wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote, "Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta) have the best wings in town."
bild.255016.9: NBA insider Shams Charania announced on Twitter on Sunday that the NBA has ordered Williams to quarantine for ten days.
bild.255016.10: Thus, the Clippers star misses the first two official games after the test game phase.
bild.255016.11: At Disney World, the NBA wants to end the Corona season.
bild.255016.12: Currently, the best 22 teams are preparing with training matches for the season finale, which begins on Friday night.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: Söder comments on the corona situation after mass infection
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich - Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) announced a test offensive for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference will be shown live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the district of Dingolfing-Landau has alarmed authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: Almost 500 harvesters from several countries are currently working on the large vegetable farm, and more than a third have been infected with the corona pathogen.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The farm is now under quarantine and is cordoned off with a construction fence.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: No one is allowed to leave the premises, food is delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities are now offering the more than 3300 residents of the community free corona tests.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the harvest helpers had little contact with the local population, the district office has so far assumed that the infections have not spread beyond the farm.
kurier.at.204625.1: "Remorse": Confession of the alleged arsonist of Nantes
kurier.at.204625.2: "My client has been cooperative," lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defense lawyer added: "He regrets the deeds very much, the confession was a liberation for him".
kurier.at.204625.4: His mandate was "plagued by remorse and very much afflicted by the extent of the destruction."
kurier.at.204625.5: If convicted, the man faces ten years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros, according to the public prosecutor's office.
kurier.at.204625.6: The Gothic St. Peter and Paul Cathedral in Nantes was severely damaged in a fire on Saturday night last week.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire had broken out in three far apart places in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory tests confirmed the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The now detained suspect had been arrested just a few hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: However, he was released after one day.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works as a volunteer for the Diocese of Nantes and was responsible for the closure of the cathedral on the eve of the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: Since there was no trace of a violent intrusion into the church, he quickly came into the focus of the investigators.
infranken.de.309597.1: Discuss the abolition of the 50+1 rule
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel has recommended considering abolishing the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: "German football should at least discuss setting conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates a fait accompli," Grindel told Bild am Sonntag.
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed: "For the clubs that are most likely to be dangerous to Bayern and Dortmund, the 50+1 rules do not work anyway: see Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, one cannot avoid the debate as to whether it is not necessary to make it easier for associations that want to break into this phalanx to involve investors."
infranken.de.309597.6: However, he has doubts as to whether there is a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority shareholdings, which are prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: "It remains a legal risk to draw investment fences around the Bundesliga as a business location in a European internal market," said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former DFB boss sees the danger that "the attempts to ensure more competitive balance in the Bundesliga will ultimately only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but will not lead to more tension in the championship".
infranken.de.309597.9: Even an equal distribution of TV money will not have a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: "FC Bayern has a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund of 500 million and RB Leipzig of 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: The differences are therefore already immense among the first three clubs alone.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million," explained the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.13: Looking at the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: "Unfortunately, there have been people who have noticed this mistake and leaked it to the press instead of talking to me about it," Grindel said of accepting an expensive watch that led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: "That has already occupied me very much on a human level."
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift worth around 11,000 euros from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: "I committed a compliance violation, and it was right to draw the consequences from it," Grindel said.
infranken.de.309597.18: "I dealt with the ominous watch gift completely transparently and innocently.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many in the DFB knew about it."
infranken.de.309597.20: He had never "made a secret of the gift," assured the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.21: "This may be called naïve, but at least this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption."
faz.79601.1: "Black Lives Matter": Injured and one dead
faz.79601.2: The protests against police violence in the United States have come to a head again due to Donald Trump's use of federal police in several cities.
faz.79601.3: On Saturday, there were clashes between demonstrators and police in various cities.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville and 16 people were arrested in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, one person was killed by gunfire while a march was crossing an intersection.
faz.79601.6: Previously, there had been clashes in Portland during protests against racism and police violence.
faz.79601.7: The security forces, including officials of the Federal Police, used tear gas on Saturday night and forcibly dispersed demonstrators.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds of protesters, some armed, marched through Louisville, Kentucky, on Saturday, demanding that those responsible for Breonna Taylor's death be held accountable.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old student was shot dead in March during a drug raid on her apartment in Louisville.
faz.79601.10: The target of the raid was someone else who did not live there, and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: When a member of a group that describes itself as an armed alliance of Black Americans fired a shot on Saturday, three people were injured.
faz.79601.12: According to NBC, they were taken to the hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them were in mortal danger.
faz.79601.14: The police set up barricades because counter-demonstrators of a white militia had also formed.
faz.79601.15: In the end, the two groups did not meet.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, one person was shot dead during a Black Lives Matter demonstration and died.
faz.79601.17: The police took a suspect into custody, according to their own statements.
faz.79601.18: She has not yet provided further details on the circumstances of the crime.
faz.79601.19: Mayor Steve Adler said he was, like many in the city, "heartbroken and stunned" by what had happened, according to the New York Times.
faz.79601.20: In the American metropolis of Seattle, demonstrators clashed with the police on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to construction trucks in front of a juvenile prison, the police used stun grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the Seattle Times, 16 people were arrested for resisting police officers or assault.
faz.79601.23: In the city of Oakland, California, a courthouse was set on fire.
faz.79601.24: A small group of protesters smashed windows, shot down fireworks and blinded police officers with lasers, Oakland police said late Saturday night (local time).
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver, Colorado, a car drove through a crowd demonstrating on a highway.
faz.79601.27: Police said one of the protesters fired a gun and at least one person was taken to the hospital injured.
faz.79601.28: In addition, windows were smashed in a court and a fire was set, as the police announced.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: Historical costumes defy Corona
infranken.de.309607.2: Although the big party in the spa town was missing, visitors and performers enjoyed the Rakoczy flair of the alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organizers: The Rakoczy weekend without Rakoczy festival.
infranken.de.309607.4: But: Even if the big party mile in the city center was missing, the crowds and program highlights such as Saale, Rakoczy Ball or Parade is burning, many still got their money's worth with the Corona-compliant alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.5: "I think we have succeeded in spreading Rakoczy flair," says spa director Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: The guests would have accepted it well.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, one returns to the beginnings of the Rakoczy festival, when only the historical were the focus of the festival.
infranken.de.309607.9: Vesna Konhäuser and her husband have been visiting Bad Kissingen for more than 25 years for the Rakoczy Festival.
infranken.de.309607.10: So also this time in the Corona year.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple has made themselves comfortable at the Luitpold Casino, watches the historical while strolling and listens to the Cuban live music at the casino restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: "I also find it quite pleasant," says Konhäuser.
infranken.de.309607.13: She does not miss the crowds that otherwise belong to Rakoczy.
infranken.de.309607.14: But it lacks the usual program highlights, especially Saale burns on Friday evening as well as the historic procession and the closing fireworks on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather would have been great this year," she says.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczy equestrian tournament to take place again
infranken.de.309607.18: For the performers of the historical spa guests, the alternative program sometimes meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For example, for Christina Gold, who takes part in the procession in a normal year and can be seen there on the carriage of the Kurgartencafé.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year she walked around the city on Saturdays and Sundays in costume.
infranken.de.309607.21: "It's more exhausting, otherwise we'll have it easier," she says.
infranken.de.309607.22: The equestrian club had less to do, even if individual riders were in the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: "We very much hope that the Reiterquadrille will be able to take place again next year," says chairwoman Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She announced that after a break of several years, a Rakoczy equestrian tournament will take place again in 2021.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 corona cases at Spanish second division club Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: The Spanish second division football club CF Fuenlabrada is sliding deeper and deeper into the crisis due to a corona outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from near Madrid flew to a game in the city of A Coruña on July 20 despite the first corona cases, one low blow follows the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had tested positive, one came to the hospital, as the club announced.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada from the city of the same name south-west of Madrid has so far had the chance to reach the promotion playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now even the relegation to the B group of the Second League threatens.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The match against Deportivo La Coruña last Monday was cancelled at the last moment, the public prosecutor's office is investigating a possible crime against public health, the top sports authority CSD is considering the forced relegation of the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: The players and other team members are in quarantine in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: "Until the sixth day of quarantine, they did not receive a fresh towel and gel," wrote the sports newspaper "AS".
morgenpost.de.276358.10: Photos show how players hung up underwear and club clothes in their rooms in the hotel to dry after they apparently had to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: Also, the bed linen had not been changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: It is neither good nor sufficient, wrote "AS".
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management, on the other hand, said they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The accusation of deliberately endangering public health was rejected by the club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: The son of the president of the Spanish Primera Division, Javier Tebas, stressed that the corona rules established by the Football Association had not been violated, as the news agency Europa Press and the sports newspaper "Marca" reported.
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before departure, there had been four infected until July 19, but all of them were isolated and did not travel with them.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: Right before the flight to A Coruña on Monday, all players and team members were tested again.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team was already in A Coruña, "five or six" other team members had a positive corona test.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The match was cancelled 60 minutes before kick-off, Tebas Llanas said.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police must capture horses torn out at Dampfach
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals were on the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police led her back to her owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: On Sunday morning shortly before 6 a.m., a road user reported two free-running horses on the feeder between the junction Donnersdorf/Steinsfeld and the Theres motorway junction.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officials arrived, the horses were already back between the feeder and the village of Dampfach.
mainpost.de.409271.6: After the trust of the horses could be won by the officers shortly before Dampfach, they each had a rope carried in the patrol car folded down.
azonline.de.86610.1: Professional cyclist Tony Martin: Career continuation conceivable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is thinking about continuing his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt/Main - Seven-time time trial world champion Tony Martin can certainly imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: "I am currently working with the team to set out the framework conditions for how and in what form it could continue," said the 35-year-old of the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung".
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by the Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the Corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: The negotiations with his team are also about the number of race days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or other problems that would plague him as a family man, Martin said.
azonline.de.86610.8: He used to get up after a fall, and the first thought was: "Quickly back on the bike.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a young daughter, I think: What if"
azonline.de.86610.10: The professional cyclist admitted that there are certainly aspects with which he is increasingly struggling.
azonline.de.86610.11: "But it was good for me to use the Corona period to realize what I have in cycling and how much fun it is for me."
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist returns to the competition at the Tour de l'Ain (5 to 9 August).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on Bavaria's roads at the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The beautiful weather attracts bikers to the streets in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the tour ends fatally by motorcycle.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Schönthal - In accidents on Bavaria's roads, several, mostly young people died at the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: An 18-year-old motorcyclist was hit on Saturday near Schönthal (cham district) by a car that came into the opposite lane.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: Why the car got into the opposite lane was initially unclear.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: In Upper Bavaria, a 22-year-old collided with a horse-drawn carriage on his machine on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to the police, he was traveling downhill near Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: In a left turn, he crashed into the carriage.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve occupants of the carriage, one man was seriously injured and one man slightly injured, police said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: In another fatal accident, an 18-year-old died in Bad Kötzting in Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He had laid down on a road on Sunday night and was run over by a 42-year-old driver.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: According to the police, the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The driver could no longer brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: Near Schönberg (Freyung-Grafenau district) on Saturday, a 57-year-old biker crashed head-on into a car in a right-hand bend despite emergency braking.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.18: He died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered a shock, the remaining three people in the car remained uninjured.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: The safety of motorcyclists was discussed on Saturday by Bavaria's Minister of Transport Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organizer of the biker protests against driving bans announced for August, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments such as underrun protection on crash barriers and the defusing of dangerous curves.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: "For the safety of motorcyclists, we have achieved a lot in recent years," the letter said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: "The number of motorized two-wheeler drivers killed fell by around 28 percent compared to 2011."
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tests with Monaco against Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - For football coach Niko Kovac, there will soon be a reunion with Eintracht Frankfurt with his new club AS Monaco.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champions will play on 1 August (18.00 hrs) at the Hessen, the former club of the Croatian.
freiepresse.de.254098.4: For the Bundesliga club, it is the first and only endurance test before the second leg of the Europa League against FC Basel (6 August).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, the match will be played without spectators.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: "We are especially looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It's always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet friends," Kovac explained.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: From a sporting point of view, this is an interesting test, said the 48-year-old.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Before his move to FC Bayern Munich, Kovac had coached the Hessians from 2016 to 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB Cup.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: "A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us in terms of the game against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like all Frankfurters, I'm looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again," said Eintracht coach Adi Hütter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50-year-old Austrian had succeeded the Croatian at Eintracht.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, the Frankfurters had lost the first leg of the round of sixteen against Basel in their own stadium with 0:3.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Almost 50 new infections: Hof district just past lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: In the district of Hof, the number of known new corona infections has increased further over the weekend: from 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and no longer falls into this statistic) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: In addition, there is a case in the city of Hof.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.4: This means that the Hof area is approaching the critical mark of 50 new infections per 100,000 inhabitants in one week.
euronews-de.199228.1: 700 dead by monsoon rains in Southeast Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: More than 9 million people are affected by the severe floods in Southeast Asia, mainly in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.
euronews-de.199228.3: Due to the heavy monsoon rains, a total of 700 people were killed.
euronews-de.199228.4: In Bangladesh, the Red Crescent is trying to reach the isolated people in boats.
euronews-de.199228.6: The farmers have lost their crops.
euronews-de.199228.7: Rhinos in National Park die from landslides
euronews-de.199228.8: In Kaziranga National Park, several of the 120 rhinos died from landslides.
euronews-de.199228.9: They are under protection and are considered endangered by extinction.
euronews-de.199228.10: This year, the floods are particularly bad, which scientists attribute to climate change.
euronews-de.199228.11: According to the United Nations, Bangladesh is one of the countries most affected by global warming.
euronews-de.199228.13: In the town of Cox's Bazar in the south of Bangladesh, the state has built apartments for 650 displaced by the floods.
euronews-de.199228.14: So far, only a few have moved in.
euronews-de.199228.15: It is difficult to bring people to Cox's Bazar.
euronews-de.199228.16: The enthusiasm also persists in Grenezn.
euronews-de.199228.17: Anyone who used to have a house, no matter how small it was and resembled a hut, often does not want to spend his life in a large apartment block.
euronews-de.199228.18: Many apartments are empty, but - as the government wants - will soon be occupied by those who have lost their house due to the floods.

handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new demands could not be met, said the Ministry of Economy in Buenos Aires on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: "That would not only be irresponsible, but also unjust," it said in a statement.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: "While 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors."
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debt of the second-largest economy in South America is no longer sustainable under the current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: That is why Argentina is demanding that its private creditors waive part of their claims of around 66 billion US dollars (around 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If no agreement is reached, the country is again threatened with national bankruptcy.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth default in Argentine history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Most recently, lenders had demanded higher interest rates on government bonds and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentine government is sticking to its last offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is in a severe financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate was recently more than 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: For the current year, experts expect a decline in economic power of around ten percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: At the end of May, Argentina had failed to pay $503 million in interest receivables, slipping into a limited default.
pnp.de.390078.2: "Things are going very well" - this is the conclusion drawn by Dr. Stefanie Kramer after her first days in the notary's department in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything went very quickly: In mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer learned that she would succeed Lutz Feller in the Eggenfelden notary's office.
pnp.de.390078.4: Just six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the doctor of law began work, and normal day-to-day business has long been running at full speed.
pnp.de.390078.5: "Privately, however, I still have to arrive," she explains in an interview with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: Of course, the short lead time was not enough to completely relocate the center of life from Regensburg to Eggenfelden, reports the native dingolfingerin.
pnp.de.390078.7: She is currently looking for a suitable apartment or house in the city with her husband, who works as a judge at the regional court in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband was able to apply for parental leave at short notice in order to ensure the care of the two daughters (31/2 and 11/2 years old).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute every day from Regensburg, she also has an overnight stay with her parents in Dingolfing for the time being, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Growing up in the neighbouring district, the city of Eggenfelden has of course long been known to her.
pnp.de.390078.11: During visits to the site with her family in recent months, she again realized: "Eggenfelden is a really nice small town".
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she had won the race in the selection process for the vacancy.
pnp.de.390078.13: Her native Lower Bavaria also plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional career: After studying law in Passau, she completed her legal clerkship and the 2nd state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several positions as a notary assessor, including in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in the Unterallgäu and Regensburg - during this time she also shouldered her doctorate in employment law "on the side" - she took up her first position as a notary in Rotthalmünster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016, she went on parental leave, which was finally followed by the move to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then, she has taken over representation services in various notarial offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden was advertised because of Lutz Feller's approaching retirement, she saw the right time for full professional re-entry, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.18: The team of her predecessor, who will take over the holiday replacement in the notary's office in the future, has taken over Completely by Dr. Stefanie Kramer - and immediately has praise for the team of the law firm: "It's going great!"
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-rehearsed processes makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of her private center of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: In terms of kindergarten and crèche places, she has already made contact with a local institution.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything goes as desired, she hopes to be able to pursue her hobby here soon - and get to know the most beautiful jogging routes in the Rottal.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans to start the league with a maximum of 15,000 spectators
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund The largest German football stadium in Dortmund will not even be 20 percent full at the start of the season in the event of a fan return.
an-online.de.487062.3: "Due to the distance regulation, which must be adhered to, we are currently planning with 12,000 to 15,000 spectators," Borussia Dortmund's managing director Carsten Cramer told the "Tagesspiegel".
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the district city holds just over 81,000 spectators at Bundesliga matches.
an-online.de.487062.5: In last season's ghost games caused by the corona pandemic, BVB lost around four million euros per game.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitization and internationalization at BVB, hopes that in addition to the normal spectator seats, some of the approximately 4,000 seats in the hospitality sector can be opened again: "It is of course a blow to the office if these revenues break away completely."
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing corona crisis, everyone is currently "well advised to take a stable page-long time".
an-online.de.487062.8: "If many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people in Germany alone are on short-time work, then the need for entertainment is limited," explained Cramer.
an-online.de.487062.9: The Dortmund marketing boss praised the BVB professionals for their partial salary waiver, which should help to overcome the crisis: "Of course, the players know that their salary waiver has a different effect than if we put 100 people who work in merchandising on short-time work".
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: Early start in life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Hardly heavier than a pack of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body: that was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of around 400 premature babies who are cared for annually at the Graz Children's Hospital.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, a few - like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extreme lightweights with less than a kilogram of birth weight.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and born prematurely that neither lungs, nor intestines, nor muscles are fully formed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Their skin is sometimes so tender that they could injure the electrodes of an ECG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that they sometimes wear doll clothes and mini diapers made especially for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they wouldn't be in their voices - "and how," smiles Berndt Urlesberger.
kurier.at.204565.9: "Even if, of course, they don't scream quite as loudly as big babies."
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes a stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Despite Corona Theater in the classroom: The whiteboard as a stage was experienced by the 9th graders of the Sankt-Jakobus-Gymnasium in Abtsgmünd shortly before the start of the holidays.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.3: Actress Julia Sylvester from the Theater der Stadt Aalen presented the production "Das Heimatkleid" to the students - by video.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.4: Afterwards, the students were able to exchange information about the play and the performance via Skype with the actress and the director Winfried Tobias.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format was born from the current Corona situation.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was pleased about the enrichment of the lessons.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even if in the end all participants agreed that the direct encounter in the theatre and stage space would offer additional stimuli, one can also see the potential for contact in the schools in the theatre.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: "If we continue to improve the technical framework, it could be an interesting addition to the game operation," emphasized director Winfried Tobias.

abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.3: This was the result of the draw on Sunday.

mz-web.de.376296.1: "Gone with the Wind": Film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: Film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died on Sunday in Paris at the age of 104 of a natural death, confirmed her spokeswoman for the German press Agency.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the Southern epic "Gone with the Wind" (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born in Tokyo to British parents, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as a toddler.
mz-web.de.376296.6: The Austrian theatre man Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of Hermia in Shakespeare's "Midsummer Night's Dream".
mz-web.de.376296.7: The film studio Warner Brothers signed her for seven years and released her alongside Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She made eight films with the heartbreaker.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946 she won her first Oscar in the leading role of "To Each His Own".
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film was shown in Germany under the title "Mutterherz".
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later came the award for best actress in William Wyler's "The Heiress".
mz-web.de.376296.12: She also received a lot of recognition as a neurotic eccentric in "The Dark Mirror" and "The Snake Pit".
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier proposed her in 1952 for the leading role in the film adaptation of her novel "My Cousin Rachel".
mz-web.de.376296.14: The piece became a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: With her long-time friend Bette Davis, she played in "Lullaby for a Corpse".
mz-web.de.376296.16: His marriage to the writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953) produced a son, Benjamin.
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married the journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had a daughter Gisèle with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: Rumors of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath, however, have never been confirmed.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.1: "Road to Timmendorf": Beach volleyball: Thole/Wickler miss final on comeback
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.2: The World Cup runners-up Julius Thole and Clemens Wickler missed the final of the beach volleyball tournament "Road to Timmendorf".
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.3: At the meeting of the top teams in Düsseldorf, they lost in the semi-finals to their national team colleagues Nils Ehlers and Lars Flüggen with 1:2 (17:21, 21:17, 19:21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.4: Thole/Wickler last played at the World Tour Final in Rome in September of last year.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.5: In the final on the Rhine, their conquerors Ehlers/Flüggen conceded a defeat against the surprise team Lukas Pfretschner and his interim partner Steven van de Velde with 0:2 (17:21, 17:21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.6: In addition to the show tournament, three starting places for the German Championships were played at the beginning of September in Timmendorfer Strand: The tickets were secured by Armin Dollinger/Simon Kulzer, Manuel Harms/Richard Peemüller and Simon Pfretschner/Milan Sievers.
paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz expulsion from AfD confirmed - FDP speaks of "fig leaf"
paz-online.de.95211.2: The exclusion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is from the point of view of the FDP only a "fig leaf" and does not change the character of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.3: "The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the right-wing extremists in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the tip of the iceberg of the radicals in the AfD," fdp interior politician Benjamin Strasser told the dpa news agency in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: The Federal Arbitration Court of the AfD had confirmed on Saturday in Stuttgart after several hours of hearing the exclusion of Kalbitz, which the Federal Executive Board had decided in May by a majority.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD parliamentary group in the Brandenburg state parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: "If the AfD really wanted to consistently remove right-wing extremists from its party, functionaries like Björn Höcke and his supporters would have been excluded long ago," Strasser said.
paz-online.de.95211.8: "However, there is no political will in the AfD to do this, because right-wing extremism is now part of the party."
paz-online.de.95211.9: CSU General Secretary Markus Blume made a similar statement: "The fact that Andreas Kalbitz is now excluded says nothing and changes nothing," he told the "Welt am Sonntag".
paz-online.de.95211.10: "Rather, it speaks volumes how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist in the middle of the AfD still has."
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume assumes that the AfD will end up below five percent in elections in the future.
paz-online.de.95211.12: "The days of the AfD in the parliaments are numbered."
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen of the now officially dissolved "wing" around the Thuringian AfD state and parliamentary group chairman Björn Höcke; the Office for the Protection of the Constitution classifies the border as a "certain right-wing extremist aspiration".
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD federal executive had thrown Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: As a reason, he stated that Kalbitz had not indicated a previous membership in the now banned right-wing extremist "Heimattreue Deutsche Jugend" (HDJ) and the Republicans when he joined the party.
paz-online.de.95211.16: Kalbitz denies membership in the HDJ.
paz-online.de.95211.17: The chairman of the Left Party in the Brandenburg state parliament, Sebastian Walter, also stressed that the decision of the Federal Court of Arbitration did not change the character of the AfD: "The wolf has only eaten chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains a far-right party, with or without Kalbitz."
paz-online.de.95211.19: Neither the federal party nor the right wing will be weakened with this decision.
paz-online.de.95211.20: "The manoeuvre of the Meuthen troops is transparent.
paz-online.de.95211.21: You want to avoid further observation by the Office for the Protection of the Constitution and try to get through under the radar," said Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: "The AfD will not get rid of the ghosts it called.
paz-online.de.95211.23: An expulsion does not change anything," commented Brandenburg SPD General Secretary Erik Stohn on the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: "Here, the AfD regional association and the parliamentary group held to their right-wing leader to this day."
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal dispute over Kalbitz's membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: He announced on Saturday that he would now take civil action against the decision of the Federal Court of Arbitration.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms supply a good 21 percent more electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: The wind power plants on the German North Sea fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid in the first six months of the year.
paz-online.de.95234.3: This is a good 21 percent more than in the same period of the previous year, said the network operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: Tennet is responsible for the transmission of North Sea electricity to the mainland and the transmission through the German power grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: The wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which are not part of Tennet's grid area, have fed in a further 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: Overall, wind power from the North Sea and Baltic Sea thus comes to 13.73 TWh, compared to a good 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind harvest at sea thus accounts for almost 19 percent of all wind power in Germany; that's about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms ensure higher generation capacities
paz-online.de.95234.9: In addition to the wind conditions, the increased contribution of offshore wind energy results from higher generation capacities because new wind farms have been connected to the grid in the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1270 wind power plants in the North Sea were all running at full power at the same time, they could mathematically generate 6.7 gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient for this; according to Tennet, it is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: By 2030, it is expected to rise to 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea.
paz-online.de.95234.13: "In Germany and the Netherlands, we are investing 20 billion euros in the expansion of offshore grid connections by then," said Tennet Managing Director Tim Meyerjürgens.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, wind farms cannot exhaust their capacity even at sea, but reach about 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The record day so far this year is January 2, when the North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, the North Sea wind turbines produce about 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of electricity, which corresponds to three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This could supply almost seven million households with electricity.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.1: Art "Skirmish" - an exhibition by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold in the gallery of the Gmünder Kunstverein.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.2: That was almost a small anniversary celebration for the 130th anniversary.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.3: Birthday of the Gmünder Kunstverein: The exhibition opening "Skirmish" with works by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold went beyond the usual framework after the Corona break.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.4: Many more art lovers than usual followed the dialogue between the artist and the chairman of the Kunstverein, Professor Dr. Klaus Ripper.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.5: The musical equivalent was provided by the band "Defenders of the Universe" on the southern Kornhausplatz.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.6: North of the gallery, the association "Sandtogether" was involved.
dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windbergfest cancelled due to Corona
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windbergfest will not take place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The city of Freital has cancelled the three-day festival planned for September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, over 30,000 people had visited this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: "We really did not make this decision easy for ourselves and - aware of how difficult it is economically for those involved - hoped until the last minute," said Lord Mayor Uwe Rumberg (independent).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: "But ultimately, as organizers, we are responsible for the health of many thousands of people."
dnn-online.de.39567.7: If tens of thousands had flocked to the festival grounds and the marquee, minimum distances, hygiene regulations and contact tracing in accordance with the current corona protection regulation could not have been complied with.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so severe that not much would have remained of a folk festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: In addition, the organisational and monitoring effort would increase disproportionately many times over.
dnn-online.de.39567.10: Rumberg put off until next year.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: Then the city of Freital will celebrate its 100th anniversary with the WinterbergFest from 7 to 9 May 2021 and the Day of the Saxons from 10 to 12 September 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: Dressage Olympic champion Werth in Achleiten not to be beaten
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten - Six-time Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage tournament in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51-year-old from Rheinberg came to four victories in four starts at the weekend.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After winning a Grand Prix each with Weihegold and Quantaz at the start, she was also unbeatable on Sunday in the Grand Prix Special and in the freestyle.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: On the 15-year-old mare Weihegold, Werth clearly prevailed in the special on Sunday against the Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: Also in the freestyle on Saturday on Quantaz, the German was clearly ahead of her 34-year-old student Victoria Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth's winning horse Quantaz belongs to Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The most successful dressage rider in the world is to establish the ten-year-old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: For Quantaz it was the first freestyle ever.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: Werth had already won all four important stages at the first tournament in Achleiten three weeks ago.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international tournaments is scheduled for August 14-16.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More air traffic controllers in Worms in the future
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: The University of Applied Sciences in Worms continues to take to the skies: "DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung" (DFS German Air Traffic Control) is endowing a professorship for "Air Traffic Management".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and will start in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: With the professorship, it is possible to start studies not only in the summer semester, but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, capacities at both the university and DFS's air traffic control academy are being used evenly.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: DFS will advise the university on the establishment and appointment of the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester of 2019, the first students have been enrolled in air traffic management as part of their training as air traffic controllers at Worms University of Applied Sciences.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: This year, nine students have already started.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: So far, DFS's experience has been very positive, and the students' achievements are outstanding.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of studies and pilot training makes a significant contribution to further increasing the attractiveness of the pilot profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: "In these times, funding is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we firmly expect air traffic to recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: In order to be able to continue to fulfil our legal mandate in the future, we need highly qualified personnel," says Professor Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, Chairman of the Managing Board of DFS, at the signing of the contract.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: "For DFS, the endowed professorship is a future-proof investment that will provide air traffic controllers with a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: We are therefore continuing the good cooperation with the university and at the same time underpinning our attractiveness as an employer."
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: This is also underlined by Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of Worms University of Applied Sciences: "The endowed professorship forms an important bridge between science and industry.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With it, we would like to build on the already existing cooperation with DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung as a practical partner for the dual bachelor's degree program in Air Traffic Management."
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: The trust of the German Air Traffic Control is both a motivation and an obligation for Worms University of Applied Sciences to further expand its teaching and research competence in the future fields of air traffic.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.22: Working for the air traffic controllers of tomorrow, the university can set very special highlights and innovative priorities for its students with the first endowed professorship for a dual course of study.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.23: Dr. Denis Alt, State Secretary in the Ministry of Science, Further Education and Culture, emphasizes: "Worms University of Applied Sciences has a unique selling point in Rhineland-Palatinate with its focus on air transport.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.24: Today's signing of the cooperation agreement strengthens the profile of the university."
main-netz.de.61826.1: Rescue helicopter lands on the A 45

main-netz.de.61826.3: A 76-Year-old drove with a Ford around 12.40 clock in the exit Alzenau-Mitte in the curve straight ahead and landed at the guardrail.
main-netz.de.61826.4: As a result of the impact, the front airbags were triggered, the driver suffered minor injuries to the face and had to be taken to a hospital for treatment.
main-netz.de.61826.5: The injuries of the 72-year-old passenger were treated by the emergency doctor and the patient was then flown by rescue helicopter to a hospital.

mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: Heil wants to test other industries after meat industry
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The corona crisis brought the conditions in parts of the meat industry back to light.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.3: Tightening of the law is imminent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they legal - and will it stay that way?
mittelbayerische.de.307327.5: Federal Labor Minister Hubertus Heil (SPD) wants to check other industries after the now planned strict regulations against grievances in the meat industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.6: "We will look at industry by industry and then take appropriate measures for the respective industry if necessary," Heil told the German Press Agency in Berlin.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.7: Germany's employers are already warning against restricting work contracts in general.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.8: After the mass corona outbreak at the meat giant Tönnies in North Rhine-Westphalia, the Federal Cabinet wants to pass a law by Heil this Wednesday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.9: Large slaughterhouses should no longer be allowed to use external personnel for slaughter, cutting and meat processing.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: To this end, the use of contract workers and temporary workers is to be prohibited there.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employer President Ingo Kramer told the dpa: "Stay away from a general restriction of work contracts and temporary employment, if you do not want to completely strangle the economy".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: Work contracts, for example, are the basis for their added value at the customer for large areas of the trade, the construction industry and plant construction.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: "The misdeeds of individuals cannot destroy such an important instrument."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil assured: "My goal is not to ban work contracts everywhere in the German economy."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.15: Contracts for work and services make sense.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: "If an industrial company commissions a craftsman to install a security system, this is a completely normal contract for work."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry considers a ban on work contracts and temporary work in its industry alone to be unconstitutional.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: It is not explainable why different labor law should apply to portioning and packaging of cheese in the future than to sausage, according to a statement on the draft law, as the "Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung" (Saturday) reports.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: In the event of a ban, the consumer price would rise by 10 to 20 percent per kilo and product.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: According to the results of an audit by the NRW Occupational Health and Safety Administration, many Eastern European employees from work contract companies worked in the industry for 16 hours a day.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wages were withheld for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also noted that the situation with the accommodation of employees was often miserable.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said that a relatively strict law had already come into force for the meat industry in 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.25: However, these were circumvented by "tricky constructions".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.26: "Now we have to clean up fundamentally."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician announced: "In the Occupational Health and Safety Act, which we want to adopt in the cabinet at the end of July, there are also measures that do not only affect the meat industry - for example, higher inspection rates for occupational health and safety or clear criteria for shared accommodation".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft presented to dpa includes amendments to the Act on safeguarding workers' rights in the meat industry and the Occupational Health and Safety Act.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.29: Brandenburg's Consumer Protection Minister Ursula Nonnemacher (Greens) believes that more intensive controls are necessary.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.30: "I would like us to be able to carry out even more controls in many areas of supervision: food controls, animal welfare, all sorts of things, including animal transport," Nonnemacher said on Sunday in the RBB programme "Brandenburg aktuell".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.31: But more controls also require more staff positions.
