hna.de.247362.1: Car rolls over: Young woman seriously injured in accident on Bundesstraße 83 near Hofgeismar
hna.de.247362.2: In an accident between Schöneberg and Hümme, a 21-Year-old has suffered on Sunday around 13.25 clock serious injuries.
hna.de.247362.3: She was taken to kassel Hospital.
hna.de.247362.4: With thermal imaging cameras, the fire brigade searched for possible passengers.
hna.de.247362.5: According to the police, the woman was on the bundesstraße 83 in the direction of her place of residence Hümme, when her car came off the road for a previously unexplained reason and rolled over several times.
hna.de.247362.6: In order to save the victim, the fire brigade had to cut the roof of the car free.
hna.de.247362.7: Since it was unclear whether there was anyone else in the vehicle, the adjacent corn field was searched from the turntable ladder with a thermal imaging camera.
hna.de.247362.8: The drone squadron from Warburg, which also works with thermal imaging cameras, had also been ordered for the search for people.
hna.de.247362.9: However, the emergency services did not find anyone between the tall maize plants.
hna.de.247362.10: The seriously injured was taken by ambulance to the Kassel hospital for further care.
hna.de.247362.11: Almost 50 firefighters from the Hofgeismar, Hümme and Schöneberg fire brigades were on site.
hna.de.247362.12: The main road was closed for two hours because of the accident.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.2: Turin - After a redemptive goal by Cristiano Ronaldo, record champions Juventus Turin have secured the Italian championship for the ninth time in a row.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.3: The team around the five-time world footballer made the 36th Scudetto in the club's history perfect with a 2-0 (1-0) on Sunday evening in the home game against Sampdoria Genoa.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.4: Ronaldo scored to make it 1-0 before half-time.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.5: With 83 points, Turin, which started without the recently long-injured ex-international Sami Khedira, can no longer be ousted from first place two matchdays before the end of the Serie A season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.6: Second in the table Inter Milan are seven points behind.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.7: Juventus were harmless despite optical superiority in the first half, then Ronaldo scored after a free-kick variant with the last action.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.8: The 35-year-old converted a feed from Miralem Pjanic directly from the edge of the penalty area with a flat shot (45.+7).
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.9: Against the now more offensive guests, Ronaldo was also involved in the 2-0, after his shot Federico Bernardeschi (67th) dusted off.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.10: This ensured the lackluster but decisive success.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.11: The foul penalty missed to the bar in the 89th minute should have only Ronaldo himself with a view to the scorer rating properly nailed.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.12: "It's complicated to stay mentally and physically at ball level for 90 minutes.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.13: The games are strange and the momentum changes very slightly," said coach Maurizio Sarri after the 2-1 draw at Udinese Calcio on Thursday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.14: Above all, the mental exhaustion of his players is great, said the Juve coach.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.15: Because of the defeat, the Turin team had not yet been able to make the championship perfect.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.16: Juve's reassuring lead at the top of the table in the end was mainly due to the weakness of their competitors.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.17: In the eleven games before Sunday's game, the Sarri team had only managed five victories.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.18: Whether Ronaldo will also be top scorer is questionable.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.19: While the Portuguese superstar has scored 31 goals so far, former Dortmund player Ciro Immobile already has 34 goals to his name after his three-pointer in the 5-1 (1-1) win of fourth-placed Lazio Roma at Hellas Verona - as many as Robert Lewandowski contributed to FC Bayern's title win.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.20: The record in Italy is held by the current Juve professional Gonzalo Higuaín.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.21: The Argentine scored 36 goals for SSC Napoli in the 2015/2016 season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.22: In August, the "Old Lady" of Italian football has the next chance to win the title.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.23: Juventus are in the knockout stages of the Champions League, but will have to make up for a 1-0 first leg defeat against Olympique Lyon on 7 August to reach the final tournament in Lisbon.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.24: In the next knockout round, Real Madrid or Manchester City would wait as opponents.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-Württemberg: Over 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart - Despite all the threatened penalties and court rulings, motorists continue to step on the gas in countless illegal races on Baden-Württemberg's roads: Last year and the first four months of this year, the police in the southwest already registered more than 250 illegal car races.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: Although there are no comparative values for the years before, the speeders are increasingly doing the judicial authorities work: In 2018, a total of 155 investigations were conducted at the public prosecutor's offices between Konstanz and Mannheim for illegal races, a year later there were already 252 and in the current year until the beginning of June already 151.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: The races were less about organized events, as can be seen from the response of the Ministry of the Interior to a request from the SPD in the state parliament.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers spontaneously competed against each other or they fled from the police - this is also reported as an illegal race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: At the wheel were mainly German men between the ages of 18 and 60.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: Only in comparatively few cases are the speeders caught and also asked to pay: According to the Ministry of the Interior, a total of 113 fines have been imposed since 2018 and 15 prison sentences have been imposed.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: However, there is no evidence that the number of illegal car races is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: Rather, other motorists reacted more sensitively than before because of the numerous tragic accidents and processes of past years and reported more often, said a ministry spokesman.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: The Autobahn 8 is particularly popular with speeders. Again and again, drivers slow down the traffic there in order to make room for themselves and use the free track for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August, a dozen drivers were caught near Kirchheim unter Teck, three months earlier there were even 18 drivers on the A8 near Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.13: A81 is the most popular "race track"
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: On the A81, the police register even more races than on any other federal highway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: With a speed limit, an attempt is made to slow down the speeders on the particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The mostly high-priced and pimped-up sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates, because the drivers dodge to the lawn in Germany because of the high penalties for driving too fast and car racing in the neighboring country.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit must not be reduced to a few routes: "With a general speed limit of 130 kilometers per hour, we would solve this problem on motorways," says Martin Rivoir, the traffic expert of the SPD parliamentary group.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: "The inhibition threshold for speeders would be significantly higher if you were not allowed to travel legally here and there at 200 kilometers per hour and more."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir thinks less of education or image campaigns: "Anyone who defies all the rules in this way and puts not only their own lives, but also the lives of other road users at risk, is hardly achievable with reason."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.20: ADAC calls for stronger police crackdown
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: For the ADAC, on the other hand, this is not enough: "We assume that speeders will not be deterred by the speed limits," says Holger Bach, Head of the Transport and Environment Department at ADAC Württemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: He calls for additional and also tougher controls on the affected routes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: Not infrequently, the high-speed showdown turns into painful and momentous seriousness: Since January 2019 and until April 2020, three people have died nationwide in the races, two of them bystanders in a nightly crash in Stuttgart's city center and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: There, two young men are said to have delivered a car race in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles came off the road, crashed into a garden wall and remained on its side, the 18-year-old passenger died.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 other people were injured in the races of the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: However, according to Interior Minister Thomas Strobl, stricter penalties are not necessary: "The need for legislative action to sanction illegal motor vehicle races more harshly is not seen," says the paper of the Ministry of the Interior.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.1: Blue light from July 23: Thirsty burglar steals drinks from snack bar
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.2: Rohrdorf: A man broke into a snack bar in Rohrdorf (Calw district) on Thursday and stole drinks and cash.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.3: A witness heard noises in the valley road around 3.40 a.m. and ran in the direction of the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.4: There he noticed a man who helped himself to the refrigerator with drinks and then left the snack bar through a previously smashed front door.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.5: The perpetrator fled in the direction of the meadows behind the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.6: According to the police, the burglar also helped himself to a cash register and stole cash in the low three-digit range.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.7: The suspect is described as follows: He is about 1.75 to 1.80 meters tall and of strong stature.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.8: At the time of the crime, he was wearing a black hoodie, black pants and light shoes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.9: Further witness information is received by the police.
pnp.de.390142.1: Ackermann sprints to victory on final stage at Sibiu Tour
pnp.de.390142.2: Professional cyclist Pascal Ackermann clinced his second victory of the day on the final stage of the 10th Sibiu Tour.
pnp.de.390142.3: The 26-year-old Palatine from Team Bora-hansgrohe prevailed in the mass sprint on the 109-kilometre section with start and finish in Sibiu, having already won a stage on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.4: It was the season's victories three and four for Ackermann.
pnp.de.390142.5: In the overall standings, his Austrian teammate Gregor Mühlberger prevailed.
pnp.de.390142.6: The 26-year-old had confidently won the mountain time trial in the morning and thus took the lead in the standings.
pnp.de.390142.7: Only 104 riders were left in the evening for the final stage.
pnp.de.390142.8: No less than 18 starters had fallen victim to the time limit in the mountain time trial.
pnp.de.390142.9: "I'm really happy to start the restart of the season with a victory," Ackermann said after his success on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.10: "The sprint was really hectic," said the 26-year-old.
pnp.de.390142.11: 300 meters before the finish he simply put on his sprint, "and it worked out perfectly".
pnp.de.390142.12: In accordance with the rules of the UCI, a corona test was carried out on all race participants and their companions six days before the start of the race.
pnp.de.390142.13: During the entire tour, drivers and caregivers were separated from the organization team and the media in isolated hygiene bubbles.
pnp.de.390142.14: Spectators at the start and finish were not allowed.
bild.254818.1: Control center gave instructions for lay resuscitation
bild.254818.2: Düsseldorf - Tragic accident on Sunday afternoon in Düsseldorf-Garath.
bild.254818.3: In an apartment building, a child (4) suddenly lay lifeless in the water while bathing.
bild.254818.4: According to the fire department, the emergency call was received shortly before 1 p.m.
bild.254818.5: "A control center dispatcher immediately gave instructions for amateur resuscitation," a fire department spokesman told BILD.
bild.254818.6: The arriving rescue forces took over the resuscitation measures a little later.
bild.254818.7: The child, who was in mortal danger, was transported to the university hospital under resuscitation.
bild.254818.9: The police have routinely started the investigation into the accident.
bild.254818.10: The fire brigade spokesman: "We assume a tragic accident in the apartment".
infranken.de.309656.1: Nuremberg: Unauthorized tuning meeting - police intervene, 700 vehicles and around 1100 people
infranken.de.309656.2: Hundreds of cars and at times over 1000 people took part in a "tuning meeting" in the parking lot of a furniture store on Saturday night.
infranken.de.309656.3: The police implemented their announcement to intensify control of such events.
infranken.de.309656.4: A big tuning meeting took place on Saturday evening (25 July 2020) in Nuremberg's Südstadt.
infranken.de.309656.6: According to the police of Middle Franconia, around 10.30 p.m., the Nuremberg traffic police found an increased number of vehicles in the area of a large parking lot in the Ingolstädter Straße.
infranken.de.309656.7: As a result, the police carried out a large number of vehicle checks there.
infranken.de.309656.8: Only recently, the police had announced that they wanted to take stronger action against so-called autoposers.
infranken.de.309656.9: Illegal tuning meeting in Nuremberg: Only a small part of the "scene"
infranken.de.309656.10: The officers counted at the top a good 700 vehicles and about 1100 people, the police balance.
infranken.de.309656.11: Of these, however, only a small part of those present can be assigned to the "autoposer" and tuning scene.
infranken.de.309656.12: Apparently, the majority of the relevant scene complied with the appeal of the police.
infranken.de.309656.13: On the basis of the vehicles and persons on site, it can be assumed that these were mainly onlookers.
infranken.de.309656.14: In addition, the majority of those present adhered to the applicable infection protection regulations, in particular compliance with the minimum distance and the wearing of mouth-nose protection.
infranken.de.309656.15: The on-site inspection measures were completed around 1:00 a.m.
infranken.de.309656.16: In total, the officials noticed such structural changes in 10 vehicles that the operating license had expired.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be seized.
infranken.de.309656.19: There were no illegal car races.
infranken.de.309656.20: "The police headquarters of Middle Franconia will continue to keep an eye on what is happening and will continue to carry out increased control measures, also in connection with the emergence of onlookers," it said.
infranken.de.309656.21: The agency News5 spoke with Jürgen Schrödinger from the towing company involved: "They all have beautiful rims, we must not scratch them," says Schrödinger.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special tapes would be used for this.
infranken.de.309656.23: Also because the cars are wider, the company must take care not to make any damage.
infranken.de.309656.24: "After all, the young people should get their cars back unscathed."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Figures from the Employment Agency: 900 suspected cases of abuse in short-time work
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin - The Federal Employment Agency (BA) is looking into around 900 suspected cases of abuse of short-time working allowance.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: "With more than 880,000 companies that have reported short-time work, this is extremely little," Daniel Terzenbach, the board member responsible for operations, told the Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When, at the beginning of the corona crisis, a large number of companies suddenly applied for short-time work, the BA had to react quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: Normally, the exam takes up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: "We didn't have that much time in this hot phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: The more closely we will take a closer look at the final accounts.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: There will certainly be a lot more to come.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are not naïve and have staying power."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: Indications of abuse often come from the affected employees or trade unions.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: In addition, the BA uses analysis software to identify patterns of abuse.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of insolvency in the autumn.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: "Will there be significantly more insolvencies than in the previous year?
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: The assessments differ, but we are preparing ourselves for the worst-case event and are already training our employees in the employment agencies to process applications for insolvency money."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The figures are still inconspicuous, said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party in the New Garden dissolved
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam - On Friday evening, about 40 young people celebrated a party in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.3: The collection had been dissolved at 8.48 p.m. by the district drivers of the Prussian Palaces and Gardens Foundation (SPSG), the foundation said on PNN request.
pnn.de.185998.4: The young people then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: On Saturday evening, some young people would have played rugby in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The meadow had been cleared by district drivers, said SPSG spokesman Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: Again and again there are illegal celebrations in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: In the parks of the foundation, there are always accumulations in which the distance and hygiene rules Covid-19 handling ordinance are not observed.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June, there was a celebration with about 300 people in the Babelsberg Park, a week later about 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without a corona regulation, the parks will be closed at nightfall.
pnn.de.185998.11: Camping on the meadows is prohibited according to the park regulations, there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has been complaining for some time that visitors leave more and more garbage and destroy protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: In Berlin, meanwhile, illegal park parties have reached another dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: In the Hasenheide in the district of Neukölln, 5000 people celebrated an illegal techno party on Sunday night.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was broken up by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass tests after corona outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: With hundreds of tests, authorities have responded to a corona outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist resort of St. Wolfgang.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, as the state authorities in Linz announced.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still pending in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: Accordingly, many of the infected are young interns in tourism companies, but at least one holiday guest was tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism staff were asked to stay in their accommodations on Saturday evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.7: The curfew was set at 11 p.m.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: "There are cancellations and cancellations here and there" of bookings, said the head of the tourism association Wolfgangsee, Hans Wieser, the dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.9: Also, isolated guests had left prematurely.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist resort in Upper Austria, with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, around a third of the guests are Germans.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: On Friday, the first infections had become publicly known.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: The head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended on Saturday the behavior of the interns, who had celebrated in several restaurants and could have been infected there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: "We all liked to do that in our youth," he told the radio station Ö1.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The Tourism Board launched an information campaign to raise awareness among young employees of the dangers of Covid-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: From Saturday, hundreds of employees, holidaymakers and locals were tested.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: In addition, all guests who were in St. Wolfgang from 15 July were contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak brings back memories of the Austrian ski and party resort of Ischgl in Tyrol, which was a center of the corona spread throughout Europe in the early stages of the pandemic.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: In total, more than 1500 people in Austria are currently infected with the virus.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The focus of new infections is on Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualified for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (dpa) - The English football record champion Manchester United returns to the Champions League after a year of absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils secured third place in the table on the last matchday of the Premier League with a 2-0 (0-0) victory against direct rivals Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes now have to settle for the Europa League, because Chelsea FC still passed and qualified for the premier class in fourth place.
wn.de.700458.5: In the fight against relegation, Aston Villa was allowed to celebrate.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead through a penalty kick from Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in injury time, Jesse Lingard (90.+8) scored the final score.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, opponents of FC Bayern in the Champions League knockout round, won thanks to Mason Mount (45.+1) and Olivier Giroud (45.+4) in parallel with 2:0 (2:0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers.
wn.de.700458.9: "That means a lot to me," said coach Frank Lampard, who is also in the FA Cup final against Arsenal in his first season as Chelsea coach.
wn.de.700458.10: Chelsea's win over Wolverhampton also benefited Tottenham Hotspur, who moved past Wolves with a meagre 1-1 (1-0) win at Crystal Palace and start sixth in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the long-distance duel with Watford FC and AFC Bournemouth, but had to tremble at West Ham United for a long time for the class retention.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead of Jack Grealish (84th) was immediately compensated for by Andrei Yarmolenko (85th).
wn.de.700458.13: The 1:1 (0:0) was enough, because Watford lost 2:3 (1:3) at Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which had three coaches in the season, is relegated after five years in the first division.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, who could not save themselves by a 3-1 (2-1) at Everton FC.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, a point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool FC, who have been English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3-1 (1-1) win at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points is the highest the Reds have ever scored in a football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team narrowly missed the points record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: Manchester City holds the record with 100 points in the 2017/18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Mané (89th) turned Sunday's game around for Liverpool.
wn.de.700458.22: "It's been an extraordinary season for this wonderful club," said goal scorer van Dijk after the game, "that should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: In the end, the Premier League bosses should also be satisfied.
wn.de.700458.25: Due to the coronavirus crisis, football operations in England had been suspended from 13 March to 17 June.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, there was even discussion about a premature termination or a hosting of the remaining games on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: In the end, however, the season could be played to the end without any special incidents - but as in Germany without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence at demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Prime Minister Netanyahu are becoming increasingly violent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: During the night, there were violent clashes.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: The Israeli police violently attacked participants in a demonstration against the right-wing conservative Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in Jerusalem on Sunday night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Twelve people were arrested for participating in riots, police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: The police used, among other things, water cannons to break up the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, a total of around 6,000 people had gathered near Netanyahu's official residence on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants in a counter-demonstration who supported Netanyahu were also arrested, the news site "ynet" reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the prime minister's private mansion in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: A man was arrested near Tel Aviv, according to police, because is suspected of spraying pepper spray from a moving car on protesters on the side of the road.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a knife attack on a protester in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The demonstrator had been slightly injured in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: In Jerusalem and Tel Aviv, there have recently been several demonstrations against Netanyahu.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption trial against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Recently, Netanyahu has also been criticized for his handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is accused of premature easing and a lack of preparation for a second corona wave.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The corona crisis has severely damaged the country's economy.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate was recently more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections with the coronavirus in Israel has recently risen to new record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (NRW) - Van crashes into car - nine injured - Ruhr area - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision on Saturday afternoon on the B58 near Ahlen claimed nine slightly injured.
bild.254850.3: A motorist was with her two children (3, 5) in the direction of Beckum on the way.
bild.254850.4: The police: "Presumably she had suddenly braked because she wanted to turn".
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van driving behind her must have seen this too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: In the accident, three occupants in the car and six in the van were slightly injured.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took her to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town after Corona suspected case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen a "shining success" in its own measures to ward off the coronavirus.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: Now the country is reporting for the first time on a suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Because of a first official corona suspected case in the country, North Korea has completely sealed off a major city for fear of a catastrophe.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological defenses in the past six months, "the malignant virus may have been introduced into the country," state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: For the region around the border town of Kaesong, the state of emergency had been imposed.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The communist leadership declared the highest alert level.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: North Korea has not yet registered a single infection and described its defensive measures as a "shining success".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The symptoms of the disease were reportedly found in an "outlier" who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person had left for South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: For the border crossing within the four kilometers wide and mostly still mined military buffer zone, there was initially no confirmation from South Korea.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: South Korea's military, however, admitted the possibility of an illegal border crossing to North Korea as high, according to reports by the national news agency Yonhap.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: Investigations were carried out on some people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: North Korea called an emergency meeting of the Politburo of the Workers' Party chaired by leader Kim Jong Un on Saturday because of the suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The "dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive catastrophe."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: Kim had already ordered on Friday as a preventive measure to "completely block Kaesong and isolate each district and the region from others," it said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The affected person, as well as all people in Kaesong who had had contact with her, had been quarantined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The central military commission of the party should therefore investigate the "outlier case" as well as the behavior of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose harsh punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: According to estimates, about 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension ahead of Council meeting: City-Ost and noise protection are still up for discussion before the big summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: "In addition to environmental issues, the committee members will also vote on the development plan for the large-scale inner-city development-east project," it says rather casually in the middle section of the municipal press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, July 28, at 4:30 p.m. in the Great Hall of the CongressCentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: Above all, the upgrading of the eastern city, however, is controversially discussed until the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities for this are narrow, most recently in individual committees depending on the presence even negative.
pz-news.de.72354.5: An appeal from the economy (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project developed from the citizenry and then by the administration and the municipal council fail after almost ten years of preparation, criticized project opponent Reinhard Klein as "extra-parliamentary opposition", "clueless", "speculation", "denigration" and "deliberate false statements".
pz-news.de.72354.6: "Everyone thinks they know better," says Klein, who has been the only representative of the Pforzheim Citizens' List for a year now.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the treaties, he is in this position: "I know what I'm talking about.".
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit will be cheaper for the city, the Technical Town Hall is contrary to statements of the city administration after grants, of whose existence Klein is convinced, to renovate for 8.5 million euros.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop very differently than predicted in the town hall and on the part of the supporters from the economy.
pz-news.de.72354.10: To shape the city by his own strength and not an investor: That is his plan B. One day after Klein, the FDP/FW/UB/LED parliamentary group, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: It also essentially provides for the renovation of the Technical Town Hall, the keeping of the Schloßberg open, the rental of the Ex-Thal for administrative areas and a smaller-scale redesign of the city centre ideally with local sponsors.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: In addition, environmental issues in particular will play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the municipal council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the population of Pforzheim from health noise pollution caused by road traffic, including often speed reductions.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local traffic club Germany welcomes the widespread introduction of 30 km/h. However, the political leaders in the city are not innocent of the fact that this must happen, because they have contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus the noise by neglecting the regular bus service with thinned out intervals and by little commitment to cycling, according to the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council also votes on the participation of the city of the Energy and Climate Protection Agency Pforzheim/Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: In addition, the agenda includes membership of the climate protection pact of the state of Baden-Württemberg, the redefinition of parental contributions in the municipal day care centers and the application for inclusion in the smart city funding of the federal government.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must heed corona protection measures.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with a lot of delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: With a delay of almost half a year, Tim Zimmermann will start his debut season in the ADAC GT Masters on 31 July.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of super sports cars can start regular operation, the first test drives were now due.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, it was all about getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: For a long time, the corona crisis prevented Tim Zimmermann from embarking on his first business trip in grasser Racing's new Lamborghini Huracan.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: Under special hygiene conditions, this was now possible.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old from Langenargen completed his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his debut in the GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: "There are already a few things that are different from the Porsche from the previous season," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: "With ABS, for example, you have to go into the curves differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really a lot of fun."
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite being only 25 years old, the Dutchman is already experienced in GT racing and was able to help his new team-mate in many things.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: "I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series brings new challenges," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: "Steijn and I get along brilliantly and we have made enormous progress at the Lausitzring from session to session."
schwaebische.de.113555.15: It is precisely there - at the Lausitzring - that the GT Masters will also be holding its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From 31 July, the 33 super sports cars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: Zimmermann, who is one of 15 newcomers to the series, knows the track.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: In 2015 he was last a guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: "It worked quickly and I didn't have to get used to the track very much," says Zimmermann, who competes for the Friedrichshafen racing community Graf Zeppelin.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: "The Lausitzring has many fast passages that you have to hit optimally to be fast."
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is then, that turns out in two weeks.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: "Of course, the teams play a little poker in the tests," he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: "In the end, however, we are very satisfied and are looking forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the prelude to a densely packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: There are seven races until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current state of affairs is that no spectators will be allowed - but there is a prominent guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: In mid-August at the Nürburgring, ex-Formula 1 driver Niko Hülkenberg will take the GT wheel.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British Transport Secretary caught cold by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The British government's decision to quarantine Spain holidaymakers for two weeks after their return has caught the country's transport minister off guard, according to press reports.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: Accordingly, Grant Shapps is currently on vacation in Spain, of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on Saturday the measure.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to the rising corona numbers in Spain, the cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry without quarantine requirements is possible.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new regulation will apply from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to quarantine after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But for those who are just on vacation, the rule does not apply until Saturday, August 1, and was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: By the way, Spain is still considered one of the "safe countries" in Austria for which no quarantine in Austria is required.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: "Many ministers must have known in advance that there is a possibility of a quarantine being imposed on holidaymakers in Spain," commented Labour MP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: "But apparently no one bothered to tell Grant Shapps."
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Less than a month after the end of the corona emergency in Spain and the expiry of the strict curfew, the number of infections in the country is rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists blame the nightlife for the renewed spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of the favourite holiday destinations of the British.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government currently advises against unnecessary travel to the Spanish mainland, with the exception of the Canary Islands and Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: So far, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been recorded in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced that on the day of the Navy in his country, warships will be equipped with state-of-the-art hypersonic weapons.
mz-web.de.376126.3: With these weapons, which are unique in the world, the combat capabilities of the Russian naval forces would be expanded, Putin said on Sunday in St. Petersburg at the Central Naval Parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: According to the Interfax agency, the Ministry of Defense also informed about successful tests of the Zirkon hypersonic missile built for the Navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of around 343 meters per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.7: Underwater tropicaleo continues to be built
mz-web.de.376126.8: Construction will also continue on the nuclear-equipped underwater torpedo Poseidon, it said.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is planned to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who also sailed a military boat himself, said that this year alone, 40 new ships would be put into service with the individual fleet units of the largest country on earth.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has a coastal area as large as no other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: For 300 years, the navy has been reliably protecting Russia, Putin said at the day celebrated by sailors nationwide.
mz-web.de.376126.13: In many other Russian coastal towns, the naval forces also celebrated Navy Day with parades.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated strength at a weapons show in the Mediterranean port of Tartus.
mz-web.de.376126.16: A video released by the Ministry of Defense not only included warships, including a submarine, but also attack helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane "Hanna" reaches Texas: Help made more difficult due to Corona
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of this year's season over the Atlantic has made landfall in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening flooding, strong winds and heavy rains now threaten parts of the US state, said the National Hurricane Center of the US climate agency NOAA in the night on Sunday (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for numerous counties.
tt.com.149061.5: The corona pandemic rampant in Texas is complicating the work of the helpers, Abbott said, according to US media.
tt.com.149061.7: "Every hurricane is a tremendous challenge," Abbott said, according to the Houston Chronicle.
tt.com.149061.8: Referring to the Texas cyclone, he added, "This challenge is complicated and exacerbated when you consider it sweeps through an area that is the most affected area of the state by Covid-19."
tt.com.149061.9: According to Johns Hopkins University, around 5,000 people have died so far in Texas alone as a result of the corona pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called on people who would have to leave their homes to be careful.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices "to which we have become accustomed," such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It is important that everyone keep their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms have also been provided in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, in emergency shelters should be tested for Corona.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage had initially only been reported from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour, "Hanna" had made land on padre Island immediately off the Texas coast, according to authorities.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to the lowest level one hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: For the coastal section from Port Mansfield to Sargent, a storm surge warning was first issued and later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a slowdown, while "Hanna" moved further inland and headed for northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, Hurricane Douglas was on its way to Hawaii on Sunday night with wind speeds of around 150 kilometers per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: However, the hurricane center expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it should be on Sunday (local time) near the largest islands of Hawaii - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: Over the Atlantic, NOAA expected an above-average active hurricane season this year, according to a may forecast.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes are to be expected, of which up to six could become very strong hurricanes, the authority had said.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into storms of great strength.
tt.com.149061.28: In view of available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent, that of a below-average even only ten percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: US President Donald Trump wrote via Twitter that his government is closely monitoring the storms and is in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals denied: Video assistant "punishes" Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic were denied two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Napoli - Four goals scored, four goals denied: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a raven-black evening in the 0-2 (0-1) at SSC Napoli in the Italian football league Serie A - and was really angry at the video assistant of the referee.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: "A festival of not given goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: Never before has the VAR been so tough on a team," commented the "Corriere dello Sport".
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Hosts Napoli had taken the lead through a goal by full-back Elseid Hisaj in the 8th minute, in the 32nd minute Filip Djuricic initially celebrated the equaliser.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) took the goal back because of an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later, Djuricic shot the ball into the net again - again the VAR intervened.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: The goals of attacker Francesco Caputo (50th) and Domenico Berardi (61st) were also taken back by the referee team after the VAR had pointed out.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In injury time, Allan made the final score 2-0 for Napoli and the bitter evening for Sassuolo perfect.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: "The VAR is worse for Sassuolo than a radar trap on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology sets records," writes the "Gazzetta dello Sport".
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the hot preparation phase for the Champions League began for double winner FC Bayern with a setback.
wn.de.700404.3: Hansi Flick, who recovered "reasonably well" after a short holiday and a few days of training, has to think about how he can rebuild his successful defence after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard after the first team training.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third most minutes behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfield boss Joshua Kimmich, suffered a ligament injury to the left foot root and threatens to be missing in decisive premier class duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In Munich's muddy weather, the right-back broke off a training game and was driven off the course with a golf kart.
wn.de.700404.6: How long the unrestricted regular player has to pause in the fight for the title is open.
wn.de.700404.7: A deployment in the second leg of the second round against Chelsea FC on 8 August is likely to be difficult, the 24-year-old can hope for the final tournament starting on 12 August in Lisbon.
wn.de.700404.8: However, Bayern do not want to be stopped by the mishap from training on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.9: In his personal triple formula, Flick named the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on their way to Portugal's capital.
wn.de.700404.10: Quality, intensity and concentration should show his victory-hungry title collectors in the ideally following 28 days until the royal class final on 23 August.
wn.de.700404.11: "We have mastered the mandatory tasks with championship and cup simply excellently.
wn.de.700404.12: Now it's time to create something special," said Flick.
wn.de.700404.13: Until the Munich can deal with the final tournament and before a training camp in the Algarve concretely, but first the knockout round obligation against FC Chelsea is due.
wn.de.700404.14: After the 3-0 win in the first leg before the Corona break, the Londoners should not become a Bayern nightmare again in the home arena as in the lost "Finale dahoam" in 2012.
wn.de.700404.15: "We have to go through the door first.
wn.de.700404.16: We want to win, create good conditions and regain confidence with a good game," Flick demanded.
wn.de.700404.17: A test to get in the mood is scheduled for Friday against Olympique Marseille.
wn.de.700404.18: With a long speech, Flick had sworn his stars, who had 13 days of vacation after the double, to a unique August.
wn.de.700404.19: He welcomed 31 players to Säbener Straße, including the new players around edel-Einkauf Leroy Sané, who met all new colleagues on the pitch for the first time after his move from Manchester City.
wn.de.700404.20: "Leroy, like all the newcomers, has adapted well," Flick reported.
wn.de.700404.21: But instead of talking about the new season, when Sané & Co. are no longer allowed to train only, Flick much preferred to talk about the current title project of the German series champion.
wn.de.700404.22: After days of individual and small group training, training is now being done in team strength for the Londoners, who, in contrast to the Flick ensemble, are in the rhythm of playing.
wn.de.700404.23: After that, the Munich could face a quarter-final against FC Barcelona and Lionel Messi, in the semi-finals Real Madrid, Manchester City or Juventus Turin are possible opponents.
wn.de.700404.24: A way to the final in Lisbon "is not quite so easy," emphasized the head coach, who can rely on the services of his new assistant Miroslav Klose in training from Tuesday.
wn.de.700404.25: The World Cup record scorer Klose and Flick know from many a joint tournament preparation, what is particularly important in the 0-to-100 attunement.
wn.de.700404.26: With his current team, working is "a pleasure," praised Flick.
wn.de.700404.27: The "focus on winning" is an impressive trait of his team.
wn.de.700404.28: At the tournament with teams of nine on Sunday, it was also ambitious to the point.
wn.de.700404.29: All of the top performers were there, including Thiago and defender David Alaba, whose whereabouts beyond the premier class season are not guaranteed.
salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to crown its world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to drive on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise in order to award the world titles.
salzburg.com.306641.3: All American races, however, were cancelled.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Race calendar is becoming more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar of the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten confirmed Grand Prix so far, three more racetracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, the race will take place at the Nürburgring in Germany and in Portimão, Portugal.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will fight for Championship points on the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: This means that the 2020 race calendar currently comprises 13 races.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are pleased that we continue to make great progress in completing our plans for the 2020 season," said Formula 1 boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to conclude its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar is to be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: According to media reports, appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could still take place at the end of November before the already officially targeted races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: However, the regulations of Formula 1 require at least races on three continents for the awarding of the World Championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, only two continents will be driven, there should be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles, citing "extraordinary circumstances" due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the looming corona crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be a guest in America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation meets with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense corona situation, the races in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil will not take place.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We look forward to being back with them next season," Carey said.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races was met with criticism, especially in Brazil: "The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for it," said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in São Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: For example, the number of infections in the São Paulo area is significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: The concerns of some teams that they do not want to race in Brazil would also not justify a cancellation.
salzburg.com.306641.28: One is prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil eye against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's well-known late-night show via video link and revealed in an interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climativist Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US late-night show via video link.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she told of her fight against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also spoke about her famous "evil eye" during her encounter with Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - Over the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has attracted attention with her tireless commitment to the Fridays For Future movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke on a well-known late-night show about her plans for the future as well as her encounter with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight host Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year-old Thunberg to your show on Tuesday and conducted a lengthy interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: "How far people are going to shift the focus away from the climate crisis," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: "Everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children take to the streets," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: She finds heads of state and leading politicians who mock her on social media or even try to silence her "funny" because the reactions show her "because they have no other answer".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview, when Greta Thunberg was asked about a well-known scene in which she cast a bitter look after US President Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the 2019 UN climate summit in New York, for which the nude artist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was captured by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip resulted in a GIF, an animated image that ultimately became one of the most commonly used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the US president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To Stephen Colbert's relatively open question, she replied only briefly and dryly: "To be honest, I don't think this needs any further explanation".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert had probably not expected the quick-witted answer and disappeared from the picture laughing briefly.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her "How dare you?" speech on the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.

morgenpost.de.276366.2: Ciro Immobile is now on a par with Bayern's Robert Lewandowski in the race for Europe's Golden Boot.

mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green died
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a roller coaster ride: after a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly up again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now the blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Brilliant guitarist, drug junkie, cult follower: The co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members said in an official statement on Saturday, with another statement announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton praised Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: Mick Fleetwood spoke in an emotional reaction of a "monumental loss" for all former and current members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: The drummer Fleetwood and the guitarist Green had founded the now legendary band in London in 1967, and his dreamy instrumental hit "Albatross" is still unforgotten today.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The life of the musician ("The End Of The Game", "In The Skies") resembled a roller coaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac, Green experienced a rapid rise - the band celebrated their greatest successes but then without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: Among other things, there was a dispute because Green wanted to donate all the profits of the group to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to appear in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Just three years after its formation, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues rock guitarist suffered from substance abuse and schizophrenia, biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time, Green was treated in psychiatry.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During much of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived on the streets for a time, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent some time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a Jewish working-class family in the London borough of Bethnal Green.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: From a young age he was enthusiastic about American blues musicians such as B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: At the age of eleven he learned the first guitar handles.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager began playing guitar professionally and five years later got the chance to be the lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners on stage.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: A little later he was hired as a replacement for his idol Eric Clapton with the Bluesbreakers.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the midst of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 together with his Bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross" composed by Green gave the group their first number 1 hit in the winter of 1968/69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its downsides: Green could not cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on life between music and addiction in an interview: "The worst thing that has happened to me in life are the drugs - the best thing was to land a number 1 hit".
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green surprisingly achieved a respectable success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Fleetwood Mac, meanwhile, swam without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their 1977 album "Rumours" sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not manage a major comeback until he started in 1996 with a group of musician friends.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British "Daily Telegraph" spoke at the time of a rock star who had returned to earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free of Drugs, Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band disbanded in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his soft sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
